languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, беседовать в столь экстравагантной обстановке... не подобает знатным особам. И вы правда хотите, чтобы я нарисовала ваш портрет... в неглиже? Я... я не могу! Это уже за рамками всех приличий!"
languages.translation_comment: Зтм — Кассия стоит у мольберта в ванной
Зтм — Кассия стоит у мольберта в ванной

languages.text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, беседовать в столь экстравагантной обстановке... не подобает знатным особам. И вы правда хотите, чтобы я нарисовала ваш портрет... в неглиже? Я... я не могу! Это уже за рамками всех приличий!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, to be conversing under such extravagant circumstances is... improper of nobility. More importantly, do you truly wish for me to paint a portrait of you... disrobed? I... I cannot! This goes beyond every standard of decency!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, to be conversing under such extravagant circumstances is... improper of nobility. More importantly, do you truly wish for me to paint a portrait of you... disrobed? I... I cannot! This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il est tout à fait indécent que nous discutions dans votre salle de bain, et je n'arrive pas à croire que vous me demandiez de vous peindre alors que vous êtes ainsi... {mf|dévêtu|dévêtue} ! Je... Je refuse ! C'est tout bonnement scandaleux. Je dirais même que cette situation déroge à toutes les convenances ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, il est tout à fait indécent que nous discutions dans votre salle de bain, et je n'arrive pas à croire que vous me demandiez de vous peindre alors que vous êtes ainsi... {mf|dévêtu|dévêtue} ! Je... Je refuse ! C'est tout bonnement scandaleux. Je dirais même que cette situation déroge à toutes les convenances ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, es extremadamente inapropiado que conversemos en su cámara de baño, y no puedo creer que quiera que l{mf|e|a} retrate... ¡desvestid{mf|o|a}! No... ¡no puedo! Esto es escandaloso. ¡Va más allá de cualquier estándar de decencia!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, es extremadamente inapropiado que conversemos en su cámara de baño, y no puedo creer que quiera que l{mf|e|a} retrate... ¡desvestid{mf|o|a}! No... ¡no puedo! Esto es escandaloso. ¡Va más allá de cualquier estándar de decencia!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们在您的盥洗室里谈话，这实在是是太不合适了！而且，我不敢相信你打算要求我画一幅你……赤身裸体的画像！我……我做不到！这……这实在是太可耻了，没有一丝体面可言！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们在您的盥洗室里谈话，这实在是是太不合适了！而且，我不敢相信你打算要求我画一幅你……赤身裸体的画像！我……我做不到！这……这实在是太可耻了，没有一丝体面可言！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの浴室で私達が歩くのは不適切ですし、あなたの…ローブなしの絵を描いてほしいなんて！で、出来ません！酷い事です！全ての規則を破っています！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの浴室で私達が歩くのは不適切ですし、あなたの…ローブなしの絵を描いてほしいなんて！で、出来ません！酷い事です！全ての規則を破っています！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, es ist höchst unangemessen, dass wir uns in Eurem Badegemach unterhalten, und ich kann nicht glauben, dass ich Euch ... nackt porträtieren soll! Ich ... Ich kann einfach nicht! Es ist skandalös. Das geht weit über alle Regeln des Anstands hinaus!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, es ist höchst unangemessen, dass wir uns in Eurem Badegemach unterhalten, und ich kann nicht glauben, dass ich Euch ... nackt porträtieren soll! Ich ... Ich kann einfach nicht! Es ist skandalös. Das geht weit über alle Regeln des Anstands hinaus!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, hamamında konuşuyor oluşumuz son derece yakışıksız ve resmini... Giyinik olmadığın şekilde çizmemi istiyor olduğuna da inanamıyorum. Ben... Ben bunu yapamam! Bu bir skandal olur. Her türlü ahlak standardını ihlal etmiş olurum!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, it is most improper for us to be conversing in your bathchamber, and I cannot believe you wish me to paint a picture of you... disrobed! I... I cannot! It is scandalous. This goes beyond every standard of decency!"
